about.title: About Me
about.text: Student at ENSA Tangier, passionate about development and AI. Through my academic journey, I've developed rigor, autonomy and creativity. I master AI as a powerful tool to innovate and solve concrete problems.

technical.title: Technical Skills (AI-Augmented)
items: AI-Powered Development: ChatGPT & Cursor AI for designing and debugging real projects
General knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React Native, Firebase, Supabase
Build real mobile apps using AI guidance
Familiar with Tailwind CSS, GitHub, Expo, and Vercel deployment
Able to understand problems and guide AI to implement solutions
Self-taught with strong documentation & learning ability
